trans-unit.source: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform long-integer validation on a configuration property.
trans-unit.target: Angir at .NET Framework for å utføre lang heltall på en konfigurasjonsegenskapen deklarativt.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: You use the LongValidatorAttribute attribute to decorate a configuration property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke attributtet LongValidatorAttribute som overflate en konfigurasjonsegenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This is to instruct the .NET Framework to validate the property using a <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator> object and pass to it the value of the decorating parameters.
trans-unit.target: Dette er for å be .NET Framework for å validere den ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator>objekt og overføre den decorating parameterne.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator>

trans-unit.source: You can apply the LongValidatorAttribute attribute to property types only.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke attributtet LongValidatorAttribute egenskapstypene bare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You use this constructor in the attributed model to ensure that the value assigned to the related property is a long integer.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne konstruktøren i attributed modellen for å sikre at verdien som er tilordnet relaterte-egenskapen er et langt heltall.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include or exclude the integers in the range defined by the <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MinValue*> and <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*> property values.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å inkludere eller ekskludere heltall i området som defineres av den <> </> *> og <> </> *> egenskapsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The range is inclusive of the <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Området er inclusive av den <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A>og <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A>egenskapsverdier.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the ExcludeRange property value is `false`, the allowed values are outside the range.
trans-unit.target: Når ExcludeRange egenskapsverdien er `false`, de tillatte verdiene er utenfor området.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value must be excluded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien må utelates; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum value allowed for the property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale tillatte verdien for egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The MaxValue property value is included in the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien MaxValue er inkludert i det tillatte området.

trans-unit.source: A long integer that indicates the allowed maximum value.
trans-unit.target: Et langt heltall som angir den maksimale tillatte verdien.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MinValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er mindre enn <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MinValue*>.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MinValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum value allowed for the property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den minste tillatte verdien for egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The MinValue property value is included in the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien MinValue er inkludert i det tillatte området.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the allowed minimum value.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir den minste tillatte verdien.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is greater than <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er større enn <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*>.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You use the ValidatorInstance property value to perform string validation by calling its <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker egenskapsverdien ValidatorInstance til å utføre strengen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.Validate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> validator instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"> </xref> validerer forekomst.
